objects.text:
• Perfect Gift for Her
• Timeless Elegance
• Authentic 925 Silver
• 6 Month Warranty

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
This elegant banner is divided into four equal quadrants, creating a clean and structured layout. The central feature is a product image of rose gold and silver earrings, placed prominently in the upper-right quadrant. The main callout includes two bold text layers — **heading_1** and **heading_2** — delivering a strong, stylish headline. Subtle yet modern subtext, **subheading_1** and **subheading_2**, defines the product materials. A script-style **tagline** adds a personal touch, while **description** provides key product highlights in bullet form. **price** is displayed boldly to emphasize value, supported by a rectangular button (**cta_background**) labeled with a clear **cta** to drive conversions.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Pink: `#FFF1F5`
- Pale Pink: `#FFE8F0`
- Blush Rose: `#FBD3DC`
- Dusty Rose: `#F5C0CE`
- Deep Rose: `#C23D61`
- Accent Pink: `#E06B88`
- Plum Brown: `#7D2941`
- Pure White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of elegant earrings designed with a harmonious blend of soft and luxurious tones. The primary color is a glistening Rose Gold (#EFA6A2), used in the metal framework and floral outlines, providing warmth and sophistication. Accentuating it are the brilliant White Diamonds (#FFFFFF), adding sharp contrast and sparkle. The prominent Peach Pink enamel (#F8C6C7) on the petal shapes introduces a soft, feminine touch. Silver highlights (#D1D1D1) within the marquise-cut stones enhance depth and luster. These colors are perfectly blended, with rose gold framing the diamonds and pastel pink exuding charm—ideal for a glamorous and graceful banner.
